Based on the provided task and steps, here are the corresponding PDDL actions:

Task: Clean Your Home Efficiently

Steps:
1. Pick up and put away stray items and throw trash into waste baskets.
2. Dust, again going through the entire house room by room.
3. Take a large trash bag and go through each room emptying the waste baskets and trash cans.
4. Use a spray cleaner and rags or paper towels to clean any glass surfaces, including the TV screens.
5. First pick up any throw rugs and inside door mats and shake them outside.
6. Enjoy your clean home!

PDDL Actions:

```lisp
(:action pick_up_item
    :parameters (?it - item ?p - person ?l - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?it ?l) (at ?p ?l) (disorganized ?it))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?it) (not (at ?it ?l)) (not (disorganized ?it)) (organized ?it))
)

(:action throw_trash
    :parameters (?tr - trash ?p - person ?wb - waste_basket ?l - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?tr ?l) (at ?p ?l) (at ?wb ?l))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?tr) (not (at ?tr ?l)) (at ?tr ?wb))
)

(:action dust_room
    :parameters (?p - person ?r - room)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?r) (not (dust_free ?r)))
    :effect (dust_free ?r)
)

(:action empty_waste_basket
    :parameters (?p - person ?wb - waste_basket ?tb - trash_bag ?r - room)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?r) (at ?wb ?r) (at ?tb ?r) (full ?wb))
    :effect (and (not (full ?wb)) (full ?tb))
)

(:action clean_glass_surface
    :parameters (?p - person ?cs - glass_surface ?sc - spray_cleaner ?r - rag ?l - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?l) (at ?cs ?l) (at ?sc ?l) (at ?r ?l) (not (clean ?cs)))
    :effect (and (clean ?cs) (used ?sc) (used ?r))
)

(:action shake_rug_outside
    :parameters (?p - person ?r - rug ?l - location ?o - outside)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?l) (at ?r ?l) (not (clean ?r)))
    :effect (and (at ?r ?o) (clean ?r))
)

(:action enjoy_clean_home
    :parameters (?p - person)
    :precondition (and (clean_home))
    :effect (relaxed ?p)
)
```

These actions capture the intent and logic of each step in the task of cleaning your home efficiently. The preconditions and effects are based on the entity states provided and the descriptions of the steps.
